short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power tool for manual traders with scaled orders, copy trading features and many more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Trading Power Tool is designed to help manual traders and boost their trading. It supports scaled orders, one-click order execution, automated position sizing based on a risk value, auto order updates and copy trading.
